Title: Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay
Writer: Jon Hurwitz, Hayden Schlossberg, Jon Hurwitz (characters), Hayden Schlossberg (characters)
Actors: John Cho, Kal Penn, Rob Corddry, Jack Conley
Plot: After being mistaken for terrorists and thrown into Guantánamo Bay, stoners Harold and Kumar escape and return to the U.S., where they proceed to flee across the country with federal agents in hot pursuit.
tomatoConsensus: It may not equal its predecessor, but Harold and Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay is still good for some laughs -- and food for thought.
